action.name: Talons
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) Slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 3d4 + 2}) Slashing damage if the aarakocra moved 30+ feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit.

action.name: Wind Javelin
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) Piercing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) Thunder damage. {@hom}The javelin magically returns to the aarakocra's hand immediately after a ranged attack.
